languages.text: "Вижу, вы теперь служите не Лекс Империалис, а интересам Вольного Торговца". {n}Женщина решительно сжимает оружие.{/n}
"I see you no longer serve the Lex Imperialis, but the interests of a Rogue Trader." {n}Yeager resolutely clutches her weapon.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вижу, вы теперь служите не Лекс Империалис, а интересам Вольного Торговца". {n}Женщина решительно сжимает оружие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I see you no longer serve Lex Imperialis, but the interests of the Rogue Trader." {n}The woman resolutely clutches her weapon.{/n}

"I see you no longer serve the Lex Imperialis, but the interests of a Rogue Trader." {n}Yeager resolutely clutches her weapon.{/n}

languages.text: «Veo que ya no sirve a la Lex Imperialis, sino a los intereses de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente». {n}Yeager aferra su arma con determinación.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see you no longer serve the Lex Imperialis, but the interests of a Rogue Trader." {n}Yeager resolutely clutches her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Veo que ya no sirve a la Lex Imperialis, sino a los intereses de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente». {n}Yeager aferra su arma con determinación.{/n}

languages.text: “看得出来，你已经不再效忠于帝国法务部，而是效忠于行商浪人的个人利益。”{n}耶格尔毅然决然地握紧了武器。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see you no longer serve the Lex Imperialis, but the interests of a Rogue Trader." {n}Yeager resolutely clutches her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “看得出来，你已经不再效忠于帝国法务部，而是效忠于行商浪人的个人利益。”{n}耶格尔毅然决然地握紧了武器。{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたがレックス・インペリアではなく、ローグトレーダーの利益のために仕えているということが分かりました」{n}イェーガーは毅然として武器を掴む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see you no longer serve the Lex Imperialis, but the interests of a Rogue Trader." {n}Yeager resolutely clutches her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたがレックス・インペリアではなく、ローグトレーダーの利益のために仕えているということが分かりました」{n}イェーガーは毅然として武器を掴む。{/n}

languages.text: « Je vois que vous ne servez plus la Lex Imperialis, mais les seuls intérêts d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. » {n}Yeager se saisit de son arme d'un air résolu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see you no longer serve the Lex Imperialis, but the interests of a Rogue Trader." {n}Yeager resolutely clutches her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je vois que vous ne servez plus la Lex Imperialis, mais les seuls intérêts d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. » {n}Yeager se saisit de son arme d'un air résolu.{/n}

languages.text: "Anlıyorum ki artık Lex İmperialis'e değil, bir Hür Tacir'in çıkarlarına hizmet ediyorsun." {n}Yeager, kararlılıkla silahına sarılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see you no longer serve the Lex Imperialis, but the interests of a Rogue Trader." {n}Yeager resolutely clutches her weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum ki artık Lex İmperialis'e değil, bir Hür Tacir'in çıkarlarına hizmet ediyorsun." {n}Yeager, kararlılıkla silahına sarılıyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Wie ich sehe, dient Ihr nicht mehr dem Lex Imperia, sondern {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. {n}Yeager umfasst resolut ihre Waffe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see you no longer serve the Lex Imperialis, but the interests of a Rogue Trader." {n}Yeager resolutely clutches her weapon.{/n}
